page.title: 18CHURCH ORGANISATIONS ETC
page.content: At Chilvers Coton Methodist Church about 100 people attend church each Sunday. Within the church there are the following organisations:(1)Sunday School,(2)Mothers and Toddlers,(3) Guides and Scouts,(4)Sunday Scene(Teenage Christians).Coton is over 170 years old but part of the old church was bombed in the last world war.The main Methodist Church in Nuneaton is at St John's, which is in Nuneaton centre.At Attleborough Baptist Church they have similiar clubs to Chilvers Coton except that their teenage club is called the Wayfinders Club. Attleborough is the head of the Baptist Churches in Nuneaton. Chilvers Coton All Saints C.E. Church has very similiar organisations to the other two churches. Its clergy often take Assembly at the local schools
